imdb.plot outline: BalconyTV is devoted to the idea of music being performed on balconies. It sounds like a simple, if oddly specific, concept, but its one that has become a franchise that sees Producers in cities around the world filming performances and sharing them with the world via a central website, clocking up over 30 million views of over 6000 videos in the process. Kaunas is one among the many cities globally like Dublin, London, New York, Lisbon, Poznan, New Delhi, Sydney, LA, Toronto, Prague, Vienna, Madrid many more and much more on the way to launch.
imdb.title: BalconyTV Kaunas
